movie_title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
title: Classic Star Wars!
review: Despite all the hype, all the waiting, and all the negative buzz, this movie actually far exceeded my expectations.At 28, I grew up with Star Wars.  After 16 long years, George Lucas has delivered what he promised so long ago.If The Phantom Menace is the 'A New Hope' of the prequels, then I cannot even begin to fathom how much I will love the 'Empire Strikes Back'-like Episode 2.Whether you are a long-time diehard Star Wars fan, or just a casual viewer, I believe you will love this movie.May the Force be with you.
